programme.desc: Pat must deliver a wind generator to Ted Glen, but strong winds make the job difficult.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Its bedtime but wheres Hoppity? Bing remembers playing with him in the garden so Flop finds a torch and together they set off in the dark for an adventure.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: If you get stuck, you need some help and then you can get down by yourself.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: The bunnys friends gather for a cake party.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: The series follows a pre-school bunny named Bing as he experiences the world around him. It uses small everyday occurrences to demonstrate how he learns new ways to manage situations with the help of his carer, Flop and friends. The programmes central phrase is "Its a Bing thing!" which Flop intones at the end of each episode when Bing has successfully conquered a troubling task or enjoyed a new childhood experience.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing and Pando are both tired but insist on one last game of Hide and Seek before bed. Pando finds a great hiding place under the covers of Bing’s bed but by the time Bing finds him he’s fast asleep. Bing is tired too and gets upset when he thinks there’s nowhere left for him to sleep, but Flop and Padget find a way.

programme.title: Oswald
programme.desc: Oswald takes over the ice cream route when Johnny Snowman has the sniffles. Johnny is very grateful, especially as he has a special delivery that he does every Friday afternoon. Oswald and Weenie set off but soon find that doing a job isn’t always easy. Nevertheless, Oswald and Weenie press on and end up not only making that special delivery but also selling all of the ice cream!

programme.title: Oswald
programme.desc: Oswald and Weenie offer to pick tutti-fruits for Madame Butterfly so that she can make their favourite pie. They take little Catrina along with strict instructions not to let her spoil her appetite by eating the fruits. Once at the park, Catrina spots a mother bird struggling to feed her hungry babies and decides to help. Oswald doesn’t realise what she’s up to as he keeps being distracted by his passing friends. Thinking Catrina is trying to eat the tutti fruits herself, Oswald spills all of his fruits trying to stop her. But when he finds out what Catrina is really up to he gladly lends a hand.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Roland Sweet has commissioned Bob and Team to build a giant games testing area outside the Shopping Mall to publicise the opening of his new games store. Leo impresses Roland with his musical knowledge, so Roland asks if he can assemble the giant piano keyboard while the rest of the team build a child-sized doll’s house and Snakes and Ladders board. Bob asks Scoop to help Leo with the keyboard and but Scoop mixes up the piano keys when moving them. Leo is too proud to follow the diagram Roland gave him so he and Scoop muddle through, treating the keyboard like a jigsaw.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob and the team are building a new aquarium at the sea life center for a baby tiger shark. Scoop is excited, imagining the shark will be like a pet puppy. Leo is less than enthused, barely concealing his fear of sharks. When the shark is collected at the docks and placed in a holding tank inside Muck’s tray, Scoop convinces Muck they should take “Stripy” the shark “for a walk” around the neighbourhood. After introducing her to Pilchard, and pointing out the mayor’s office (startling Mr Bentley!), they see JJ and Saffi on the playing field, teaching Cooper some pet tricks. Determined to teach Stripy some tricks too, Scoop and Muck begin a game of fetch... which ends up with Muck getting his front bucket stuck between two trees. Back at the sea life centre, Bob is concerned. If the shark doesn’t arrive soon, she will miss her feeding time.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Little Nutbrown Hare is excited because Big Nutbrown Hare has agreed to meet him later to play games. When his father arrives to tell him a storm is coming and he needs to gather food instead, Little Nutbrown Hare is hiding so Big Nutbrown Hare leaves. He searches the meadow for his father, more and more disappointed, but when he learns why Big Nutbrown Hare couldn’t play this time, he understands.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Little Nutbrown Hare and Little Field Mouse discover creatures that can blend in with their surroundings and are inspired to learn just where they can blend in. Little Nutbrown hare becomes disappointed when his white fluffy tail and his dark brown ear tips give him away each time. That’s until he discovers the reeds by the river are exactly the right height and colours to camouflage him perfectly.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Big Nutbrown Hare has a lot to do today. Little Nutbrown Hare and Little Field Mouse promise to help but there are so many wonderful distractions they forget their promise and let Big Nutbrown Hare down. Luckily they learn a valuable lesson from some bees and get busy to make to things right!

programme.title: Learning Time With Timmy
programme.desc: Timmy and Ruffy are looking for jungle animals in the garden. They find some big footprints. What animals are they?

programme.title: Hurray for Huckle!
programme.desc: Its midday and Busytown citizens are dozing off all over town. Huckle, Sally and Lowly try to find out why. Noticing the number of sleeping people holding melted ice cream cones is an important clue. Ultimately, the kids discover that the ice cream truck isnt playing the usual perky tune to announce its arrival - its playing a lullaby./Someone has taken Huckle’s car and left their car in its place!

programme.title: Messy Goes To Okido
programme.desc: In the real world Messy finds a magnifying glass in his bedroom and everything looks bigger! He wonders why that happens so he goes off to Okido to find out. Messy lands in Felix and Zoe’s garden and they invite him to come exploring in the forest with them and Tweedy, the famous Explorer. She was the first person ever to see the very rare speckled-freckled frog! Zim and Zam arrive playing hide and seek with Zoom, but he is in disguise as a bucket, so they don’t seen him. Messy looks through Zam’s binoculars and asks how they work.

programme.title: Messy Goes To Okido
programme.desc: OKIDO is a kindergarten series about a curious blue monster called Messy. When Messy has a question, he goes to OKIDO, a town where his human friends Zoe and Felix live. Together they get help with the answers from scientific experts Zim, Zam and Zoom. The questions range from the origin of moon rocks to why humans are losing their voicesIn the real world Messy is cold and wonders if it’s going to snow! And he shoots off to Okido to discover where snow comes from. In Okido, it’s the middle of summer and Felix and Zoe are about to go to the beach, when a storm blows overhead and a snowflake lands on Messy’s nose! They realise that it really is snowing and soon the whole place is covered in deep, white snow! The trio are building a snowman when the Cloudship arrives and Zim, Zam and Zoom tell them that the snow is causing problems all over Okido… “If it doesn’t stop snowing, we’ll never go to the beach!” says Felix.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcakes Berry Bitty Adventures
programme.desc: On a road trip to find homes for his van full of orphan puppies, Huckleberry gets lost near Berry Bitty City and is invited by Strawberry to spend the night—but ends up staying longer to repair the damage that his frisky pups do to the marketplace bedroom! The girls each host one of the pups while Huck, grateful to the town for rescuing him, fakes interest in the girls’ activities in an attempt to get everyone to like him. Blueberry discovers his love of the same Patti Persimmon mystery novels that she loves, and encourages him to be himself. Meanwhile the girls swap puppies until each finds their perfect match and adopts one!

programme.title: Harry And His Bucket Full Of Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Whilst playing in the yard with Charlie, Harry insists on being first on the swing.

programme.title: Harry And His Bucket Full Of Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Harry is playing his favourite computer game when he accidentally loses Mums latest report for her newspaper.

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: When a Sunda slow loris lands in the garden, the Junior Rangers quickly learn that they have to return it to the wild. Will they manage to find the slow loris a home? Or will the slow loris end up as a snack for a hungry sun bear?

programme.title: Thomas and Friends
programme.desc: When Emily breaks down and disrupts a race between Connor and Caitlin, Caitlin shunts Emily to the castle causing Emily to travel faster than she ever has been before. Emily is in awe of Caitlin, who she believes is the best engine ever and becomes disheartened at her own ability. But when Caitlin’s brakes fail, Emily races to save her from an accident proving that she too can be a Really Useful Engine.

programme.title: Thomas and Friends
programme.desc: Phillip, the little diesel boxcab, arrives at Knapford full of energy and enthusiasm. When Gordon tells Phillip how fast he is, Phillip is determined to prove that he is faster and challenges him to a race. Unfortunately Gordon is resting on the siding when Phillip comes over and when the express engine tells Phillip to “go away”, he thinks it’s a challenge and races off. When he gets to the other end of the line and Gordon still hasn’t overtaken him, Phillip assumes he’s won, causing Gordon to show him just how fast he really can be. Phillip is very impressed, but he is not in the least disheartened as he believes he still beat Gordon the first time.

programme.title: Grisu
programme.desc: Smeraldo is to sail to the famous pirate Red Hair Annas shipwreck to retrieve its treasure chest. Grisu, accompanied by Stella, goes with Smeraldo to operate his boat crane and haul the treasure, while Smeraldo is in his submarine. Unfortunately, the young dragon unwittingly breaks the professors glasses and has to pilot the submarine all by himself. He finds the treasure but also encounters a giant and playful octopus. Grisu, surprised by the animal, burns the rope and the treasure sinks back into the sea. Everything seems lost, but a firefighter never gives up! Using a giant air bubble, Grisu manages to bring the treasure up again and saves the mission.

programme.title: Grisu
programme.desc: Natureza wants to study a very rare butterfly that lives on trees on top of mountain peaks. At Davids requests, Grisu accompanies her – as a "junior" pilot – on a hot air ballon ride to the peaks. As Grisu never flew one, theres a bunch of comic mishaps before they manage to reach the mountains. But as theyre getting close to the butterfly, the balloon accidently bumps into flying Fume. Surprised Grisu breathes a flame on the envelope heater, ruining it and bringing them back down to the ground. But a firefighter never gives up. Grisu asks his father to throw a big flame in the balloon envelope. They take off again and head for the butterfly!

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Little Nutbrown Hare is very proud of a Christmas Tree he has built from pine cones. So proud, that when Little Field Mouse accidentally knocks it over he has trouble forgiving her. When he makes a mistake of his own, Big Nutbrown Hare forgives him immediately, and he understands how important it is to forgive.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Seeing his tracks in the fresh snow inspires Little Nutbrown Hare to create a new game called ‘snow seek’. The friends have a lot of fun creating tracks for Little Nutbrown Hare to follow, but Little Redwood Fox’s tracks completely disappear and so does she. When Big Nutbrown Hare reports that Little Redwood Fox was sighted walking backwards, they work out how she managed to trick them all.

programme.title: The Fox-Badger Family
programme.desc: The children set out to find a treasure that Grandpa and his best friend hid in the forest a long time ago. And the long time is the problem as Grandpa’s clues are no longer very accurate…

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Leo and Muck are having great fun playing the very latest computer game “Space Robots!” Bob reminds them they’ve got an early start in the morning. Muck pleads to stay up a bit longer and Leo promises they’ll get a good night’s sleep…just as soon as they reach the top level of the game. But at dawn they’re still playing! Next morning, Leo and Muck are very tired and sleepy. Bob explains that they have to finish building The Spring City Wheel, a huge Ferris-wheel, in the Docklands Regeneration Area. He’s promised the Spring City Rockets they’ll be the first to ride on it - today! Bob and the gang drive towards the site but on the way Muck and Leo stop to have a quick nap.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob and the team are setting up the Spring City Halloween Festival. Everyone is excited except Lofty. Lofty thinks Halloween is scary, so when he is sent to collect a giant ghost decoration he is more than nervous. Meanwhile Wendy is trying to play a Halloween trick on Bob but keeps ending up with the joke on her. Lofty arrives to collect the ghost decoration from Curtis but even the crate it is stored in looks scary. Determined to be brave, Lofty picks up the crate. But then he hears a rattling sound and thinks it’s the ghost. He zooms off, still carrying the crated ghost, hoping to get his scary job over with. By rushing off, he doesn’t realise that the crate is not locked.

programme.title: Hurray for Huckle!
programme.desc: The new yellow t-shirt that Sally planned on wearing for her portrait painting has mysteriously turned green. Huckle and Lowly help Sally look for clues as to how this colour-change happened. They discover that mixing different colours results in the creation of a new one. It turns out that the dye from a blue blanket turned the yellow shirt green in the washing machine. / The kids discover pieces of a large metal hand, Huckle and gang are determined to find out to whom they belong.

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: Leo, Katie and Hero get to know a feathery new friend—an Indian peacock! They bring the peacock to the rainforest to look for peahens, but end up crossing paths with two jungle cats.

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: A trip to the rainforest becomes necessary when a clouded leopard cub turns up in the garden. The Junior Rangers search for the cub’s mother, but are set back when the cub gets entangled in some tree vines above water.

programme.title: Simon
programme.desc: When his parents discover that Simon has a cavity, they quickly phone the dentist for an appointment. Meanwhile, Ferdinand tells Simon how much it’s going to hurt! When they show up at the dentist’s office, Simon is terrorized. But the dentist is a sweet, gentle woman and most importantly, she’s got the coolest seat with lots of buttons to make it go up and down and swivel all around! Simon gets his cavity filled…and ha, it doesn’t even hurt!

programme.title: Berry And Dolly - Fairy Cards Mepe
programme.desc: Leapy the grasshopper makes fun of Katie the yellow ladybird, because she blows bigger bubbles than her. Later, regretting her actions, Leapy has to find a way to apologize to Katie.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly - Fairy Cards Mepe
programme.desc: Dolly accidentally knocks over a glass of water on Berrys painting. The colors on Berrys painting get faint and watery. Berry gets mad at Dolly for ruining his painting. Later Berrys friends admire the little snails unique style of painting, so he insists that it was his idea to make the painting like this. But then Dolly arrives and sheds light to Berrys lies.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly - Fairy Cards Mepe
programme.desc: One day Dolly leaves for and adventure with Harry Hedgehog, so she asks Bubbles to take care of her flowers while shes gone. Bubble forgets to water them, so they quickly wither. Now Bubble has to find a way to make the flowers bloom again.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly - Fairy Cards Mepe
programme.desc: The residents of the forest decide to celebrate the last day of the year with music. The ants form a choir, Dr Owl becomes the conductor, and all the little bugs create instruments for themselves. But Iris, the icebeetle loses her bells, so everyone starts to help her find them.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly - Fairy Cards Mepe
programme.desc: The boys resent the girls for not telling them what Christmas surprise they have in mind for the night. But all things go well, when the surprise is revealed and their old friend, the Stargirl takes them on a magical ride on her starship in the clear night sky.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly - Fairy Cards Mepe
programme.desc: The forest friends go for a walk in the forest, but Bubbles cant stop hiccupping. His friends try to help him by giving all sorts of advice. To eat, drink, hold his breath... But none of them seem to help. Finally, Stanley scares Bubbles from behind the tree. The hiccup stops, but now Bubbles is offended by Stanley. They all make amends later, after Stanley saves Bubbles from slipping into the creek.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly - Fairy Cards Mepe
programme.desc: The forest friends decide to help the Millerbug fix his broken windmill, but the wind doesnt seem to be blowing. Zephyr goes on to save the day, by asking the Wind to help the group restart the mill. Finally, the Millerbug can prepare his delicious bread.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Its snack time for Bing so Flop suggests they make a smoothie. When Bings carrot accidentally gets put in the blender, hes upset to disover he cant have it back.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing finds a frog in the garden, so he and Sula make the frog a house in a bucket.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing wants to play his car park game, but Charlie is visiting and keeps messing it up.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing and Flop play shadow tag until it starts raining and Bings shadow is outside getting wet.

programme.title: Tilda Appleseed
programme.desc: Tilda is a clever and intelligent mouse who lives in a tiny house at the base of the church wall with her pet Snaily and her best friends.

programme.title: Tilda Appleseed
programme.desc: Tilda is visited by her Great Great Aunt Emily. In honour of the occasion, all the friends have a game of Blind Mans Buff. Emily and Rupert have to take off their glasses. After the game, the two pairs of spectacles get mixed up and Emily and Rupert suddenly start suffering all manner of mishap: Rupert bites into an onion instead of an apple...

programme.title: Tilda Appleseed
programme.desc: A new kind of biscuit has been delivered to the village shop and Molly would dearly love to know how they taste. Under Tildas alarmed gaze, she climbs up the counter on which the biscuit tin is standing, climbs inside – and when a gust of wind blows the lid shut, cant get out again. Horrified, Tilda rushes off to get help from Rupert.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: A lazy Summer’s day brings a wonderful discovery for Little Nutbrown Hare… a tree full of bright, beautiful, tasty plums! Little Nutbrown Hare isn’t the only one enjoying the juicy summer fruit, it seems like every animal in the meadow has come for a taste. As the Summer goes on the plums disappear and Little Nutbrown Hare begins to wonder what all the animals will do without them.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Little Nutbrown Hare awakes to find the leaves changing colour and falling off the trees, the flowers dropping off the bushes and the tadpoles turning into frogs. Autumn is here and it’s time for change! Little Nutbrown Hare misses the joys of the Summer meadow. Will he discover that Autumn has it’s own delights?

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: The cool Autumn breeze isn’t enough to deter Little Nutbrown Hare and Little Field Mouse from going out to find what special experiences the day might bring. However, with the weather and wind constantly changing, it’s very hard for the friends continue playing any one game. Will the strange weather spoil their fun, or will it bring them a special experience after all?

programme.title: Chuggington Badge Quest
programme.desc: To earn their badges, the trainees must be efficient when picking up litter, which means not wasting any time. Wilson and Koko race off, each determined to finish first. Methodical Brewster goes more slowly, sorting the litter as he goes into 3 different bins: paper, plastic and cans. Koko and Wilson deliver their messy loads to the recycling yard – but it won’t count until it’s sorted! While a happy Brewster collects his badge, Koko and Wilson are still sorting their litter....

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: Zari was talking to her mom on her phone as she walks down a lonely street lined with a lampposts. As she stops under a lamppost and the light begins to flicker, she slowly looks upwards to see a monster hanging from a lamppost. She skates away in fear, and remember her phone was there. She returns to the area and notice the so-called monster looks like a bat. Back in the garden, Leo is practicing with his jetpack maneuvering skill by performing spiral pattern and zig zag. He talks to Katie who is by her computer. After almost crashing into Hero the dog, Leo crash lands on the ground. Katie jokes on his skill before Leo receives a call from Zari. Zari informs them of the monster she met, which they later to learn it is a Greater Flying Fox. After agreeing to help Zari out, the Junior Rangers travels to her location. They meet up with Zari under the lamppost, where she show them of the animal. Hero tries barking at the animal but it ignores him. Katie has an idea and pulled her tablet to guide the flying fox away. Leo takes Katies tablet and fly with his jetpack to guide the Flying fox. As they were travelling, Katie notices Leos Jetpack is malfunctioning, causing Leo to have issues with flying and he crash land uncontrollably into a bush. They check up on him and Leo is okay.

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: Farah was driving her dirt bike but she stops as she hears a loud cries, grabbing her attention. She investigate and finds a baby moon bear crying for help. Back in the garden, Katie and Leo are playing tag. Leo blocks Katies path to touch Hero but Katie manages to tricks him. But Hero manages to escape as he was distracted by a butterfly. Suddenly, Farah calls for help through Leos watch, informing them of the poor animal cub with her. After the Junior Rangers learn that its a Moon Bear cub and wanting to help, they travel to meet up with Farah by riding PlatypusOne. Once theyre there, Farah tells them she has name the cub Cubby. Katie then reads her tablet and says that moon bear need to learn how to climb trees, swim, mark territories and communicate with other bears to survive, hence a montage happens of the Junior Rangers. Then they try teaching Cubby how to growl like a bear so they all imitate bear growling. Cubby gives it a try but struggle to do it. Ranger Rocky randomly appears and the Junior Rangers tells him of their situation. Ranger Rocky decides to call out his dear friend Ranger Joey and asks for help.

programme.title: Charley Loves Nature
programme.desc: Today, T’choupi and his friends, Nina and Luce, must help Fred take his goats to a field a certain distance away. But when Loupiote the dog gets wounded and is unable to shepherd the goats, the kids are very disappointed. Until, all of a sudden, they get a brilliant idea: why don’t they stand in for Loupiote and play shepherd dog, to guide the goat herd to the grazing field?...!

programme.title: Charley Loves Nature
programme.desc: When T’choupi and Nina find out there’s going to be a star shower visible in the sky tonight, they get very excited, and determined not to miss it! But they’re going to have to persuade their parents in order for that to happen… Not an easy feat: they’re way too young to stay up so late…

programme.title: Charley Loves Nature
programme.desc: T’choupi and Nina are excited to be looking after a guest - a friend’s "unique" rooster by the name of Rigoletto. They ask Fred what makes it so unique but he’s not sure; all he knows is that they need to take good care of it. However, despite being housed in its very own enclosure, Rigoletto escapes and goes missing!! Huh! Maybe the animal’s "uniqueness" will allow the kids to track it down…?

programme.title: Charley Goes To School
programme.desc: Today is picture day and Charley has dressed up and made himself all handsome for the class photo. But an unfortunate mishap leads to his overalls getting a big stain! How can he get rid of it before the photographer arrives? Charley’s friends do have a few suggestions but nothing really seems to work…

programme.title: Sam And Julia
programme.desc: Friends Day: Sam overhears Julia talking to her best friend. He thought it was him?! Worried, Sam decides to investigate. (S1, ep 3)

programme.title: Sam And Julia
programme.desc: Sam is convinced that Julia admires her older brother Dan more than him. He tries to change his behavior and personality to get a better image. But does Julia really want him to change?

programme.title: Sam And Julia
programme.desc: Julia lost her lucky seashell, brought back from her island. Sam helps her find it. The investigation leads them to the home of Mrs. Dreamer, the Mansions clairvoyant mouse. But can she really help?

programme.title: Thomas And Friends
programme.desc: Diesel resents being scolded when he makes a mistake, and takes advantage of Rebeccas good nature.

programme.title: Thomas And Friends
programme.desc: Thomas is working on the Indian Railway and Charubala rewards him for always being early by giving him a very important job - delivering some precious silk to a famous fashion designer. But when Thomas sees swimming elephants on his journey, he gets so excited that he misses his turning and delivers the silk to the wrong station without realizing. Instead of listening to Ashimas advice and telling Charubala, Thomas attempts to sort out his mistake alone. He ends up getting himself into even more trouble by picking up the wrong cars/trucks, not listening to Noor Jehans warnings and continuing to not tell Charubala about the big mess he has caused. Finally he owns up to his mistakes and everyone helps him put things right!

programme.title: Caillou’s New Adventures
programme.desc: Caillou Leo and Clementine go to a "high ropes" park with Clems brother. Clementine and Caillou learn to be supportive friends and help Leo conquer his fears.

programme.title: Caillou’s New Adventures
programme.desc: Caillou struggles in a test at school and gets caught cheating. He learns to admit when things are hard so he can be helped.

programme.title: Hurray for Huckle!
programme.desc: Trying to figure out what a strange piece of metal with a number 10 on it is, Huckle and his pals take it to Blacksmith Bear who helps them discover strange writing on it. Figuring it must be a foreign language, they take it to Ms Honey and, with her help, determine the piece of metal is a lost tap from Hilda’s French tap dance shoes./Huckle and pals set out to find the whistle blower who is causing a traffic jam.

programme.title: Monkey See Monkey Do
programme.desc: Monkey tries to keep his balance and walk slowly on the edge of a stack of hay, but things are not going as planned. Thinking it is impossible Monkey cautiously watches as cat gracefully walks along the fence. When cat succeeds Monkey is so impressed that he offers cat to join him in his favorite game… “Monkey See Monkey Do”!

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: Four teams compete to win Malcolms Wildlife Photo Challenge

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: Chaos ensues at Pontypandys first ever Country Market when Sarah and James try to outsell Mandy and Norman, causing apples to fly everywhere.

programme.title: Franklin And Friends
programme.desc: Franklin is nervous about finding his own special beat to play at Aunt T’s Drum Circle. Only when he stops and listens does he find a beat unique to himself – his heartbeat. /Franklin enlists the help of all his friends to make a cardboard play plane but then alienates them all when he won’t let anyone else be pilot. Only after he’s left to play on his own does he finally realize that the plane should really belong to all of them -- and it’s much more fun to share!

programme.title: The Fox-Badger Family
programme.desc: Is Rosie hanging around with the Tomcats? Scoutbadger and Woodsy have some good reasons for thinking so…

programme.title: Doodleboo
programme.desc: Sketcky claims not to be afraid of big animals or water. Animals, water? Doodleboo challenges him to find out which big animal has thick skin and loves water.

programme.title: Doodleboo
programme.desc: Sketcky is too greedy! He cannot help eating too fast. Doodleboo shows him that he should follow the example of someone who likes to take his time.

programme.title: Doodleboo
programme.desc: Sketcky is invited to his cousins home in Megalopolis. Sketcky is very happy to visit this city full of people and cars. To avoid traffic jams in this big city, Doodleboo has an idea.

programme.title: Ruff Ruff, Tweet And Dave
programme.desc: Ruff-Ruff, Tweet and Dave make their own playground with a swing, seesaw and slide. Hatty rounds off the day with a special roundabout surprise!

programme.title: Ruff Ruff, Tweet And Dave
programme.desc: Ruff-Ruff, Tweet and Dave create new patterns for Hatty’s hat. They try a stick-shaped pattern and a colourful fruit pattern, but Hatty’s perfect pattern, just has to be stripes!

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Little Nutbrown Hare is fascinated that his friend Little Grey Squirrel is going to stay in his dray all Winter long. He and Little Field Mouse decide to hibernate in the hollow log until Spring, but soon become bored and fidgety. Little Field Mouse gives up and plays in the snow. Will Little Nutbrown Hare manage to stay inside, or will he be tempted out as well?

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: After a long quiet winter in the meadow Little Nutbrown hare announces that he can’t wait for winter to be over so he can enjoy the other seasons with their special treats to see, hear and taste. Will the sound of icicles tinkling in the wind, the taste of a frozen Winter berry and some very unusual tracks in the snow convince the little hare that Winter is just as special as the other seasons?

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Little Nutbrown Hare follows some unusual tracks in the snow that eventually lead him to a shy little spotty deer. He plays with his new friend every day, until she has to leave again with her mother to search for food. Little Nutbrown Hare is sad to see her go, but he’s also glad that he has friends that stay in the meadow all year round.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing has a great time choosing the perfect present for Sula in Padgets shop. Its a wand and is sparkly and flashy and spinny and Bing knows that she will love it. Bing is thrilled until it is time to hand the present over.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing wants to try Coco’s Hula Hoop. It’s harder than it looks but he finds lots of other hoopy games as he tries. Just as Bing almost gets it right he gets carried away with spinning, trips over and breaks the hoop. Coco is upset that she can’t hula anymore until Bing and Charlie remind her of all the other games they can still do with the bent hoop.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing and Sula are in the park playing at being giants and splashing in puddles with their big welly boots. As they play the puddles get bigger and bigger until Bing slips over in the mud and gets wet everywhere. Amma comes to the rescue with a giant warm bath and a giant carroty bagel.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Flop teaches Bing and Pando how to blow bubbles. Bing finally blows a big bubble but gets upset when Pando pops it.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing and Sula head off for a picnic at the paddling pool with Flop. But when they get there, they are shocked to find there is no water inside. Bing’s disappointment soon gives way to the realisation that it’s a very special pool day. With no water there are all sorts of games they can play that are usually against the pool rules.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly - Fairy Cards Mepe
programme.desc: Leapy the grasshopper makes fun of Katie the yellow ladybird, because she blows bigger bubbles than her. Later, regretting her actions, Leapy has to find a way to apologize to Katie.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly - Fairy Cards Mepe
programme.desc: Dolly accidentally knocks over a glass of water on Berrys painting. The colors on Berrys painting get faint and watery. Berry gets mad at Dolly for ruining his painting. Later Berrys friends admire the little snails unique style of painting, so he insists that it was his idea to make the painting like this. But then Dolly arrives and sheds light to Berrys lies.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly - Fairy Cards Mepe
programme.desc: One day Dolly leaves for and adventure with Harry Hedgehog, so she asks Bubbles to take care of her flowers while shes gone. Bubble forgets to water them, so they quickly wither. Now Bubble has to find a way to make the flowers bloom again.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly - Fairy Cards Mepe
programme.desc: The residents of the forest decide to celebrate the last day of the year with music. The ants form a choir, Dr Owl becomes the conductor, and all the little bugs create instruments for themselves. But Iris, the icebeetle loses her bells, so everyone starts to help her find them.

programme.title: Hurray for Huckle!
programme.desc: Something knocks Sgt. Murphy’s hat off his head, chops the tops of Baker Humperdink’s baguettes, and sheers a path through a flower bed. Although no one saw anything, they all heard it make the same whoop whoop whoop sound. Putting the clues together, Huckle, Sally and Lowly figure out that it was Vanderbuilt’s new, out of control, boomerang./The mysterious disappearance of Mayor Fox leaves Huckle and the gang on an important search.

programme.title: Monkey See Monkey Do
programme.desc: Its cold weather and Monkey has made a banana peel scarf for Parrot but that is not very warming or comfortable. Mole appears and tells them about sheep and her famously warm wool. Monkey feels that it would be the perfect textile to use and so they fly off to the farm. Watching her inspires monkey to invite Sheep to a fun game of Monkey See Monkey Do!

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: Mandy and Sarah are making a film comparing what dogs and cats are good at, and the cats are clearly doing better than dogs, even at fetch! But soon a kitchen fire gives Nipper the dog a chance to save the day.

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: At a picnic on Annies farm, Peter comes up with a series of games that almost lead to disaster! Meanwhile, Lizzie and Jodie search for a rare seal.

programme.title: Kipper
programme.desc: Tiger and Kipper go to the park to try out Tigers new roller blades. Tiger crashes and hurts his thumb. He tells Pig hes so badly injured that he cant use roller blades anymore and so Pig can borrow them. But Pig is quite happy on Kippers roller skates and does a ballet dance to show them.

programme.title: Kipper
programme.desc: Mouse’s two cousins come to stay at Kipper’s house. At first it seems like a good idea, although Kipper is confused as to which mouse is which. But the cousins are always hungry and they make a lot of noise. Kipper and Mouse would like them to go – but how do they set about it?

programme.title: Charley Loves Nature
programme.desc: T’choupi, Nina and Mom are busy sowing seeds in the small vegetable garden. But a bird keeps coming along and pecking them up as soon as they’ve been sown! So T’choupi and Nina decide to build a scarecrow to protect the seedbeds. They go about it in secret (although with Dad’s help) to give Mom a nice surprise. However, they get a disappointment when they realize their scarecrow isn’t scary at all!

programme.title: Charley Loves Nature
programme.desc: While out playing in the forest, T’choupi and Nina come across a broken bird’s egg. Wooow! Look at that: a little chick has literally just been born! But wait a minute: this particular egg is blue, and as far as they know, birds don’t lay blue eggs… Could it be from another type of animal?? And if so, which one? Super excited, T’choupi and Nina start searching for the mysterious creature that laid this blue egg…

programme.title: Sam And Julia
programme.desc: Today, Julia no longer feels at home among the other children and residents of the Mouse Mansion. And if her true place was finally in her island? Despite Sams efforts, she has decided to leave...

programme.title: Sam And Julia
programme.desc: The magic show that Dr. Spotty was about to perform tonight is cancelled. Julia is so disappointed that Sam decides to invent something instead. But how could he impress Julia as much as a magician?

programme.title: Tilda Appleseed
programme.desc: New guests arrive at Guesthouse Appleseed – the famous band “The Merry Mice” and two hares who want to record birds singing. But with the mice practising their music, the hares can’t hear any birds.

programme.title: The Triplets
programme.desc: The Triplets and Eliott play cards quietly in the living room, when they smell something burning in the kitchen. What a mess! Now Mommy’s cake is ruined! Eliott is really embarrassed, he has to bake the cake again. Mrs Gzell brings her sick cat for Eliott to nurse as shes going out. Eliott gives that important task to the Triplets. They are really excited! But between Toto, a particularly annoying fly and Imhotep who does whatever he wants, the Triplets have a lot of work.

programme.title: The Triplets
programme.desc: The Triplets are at the beach and they’d like to make a present for Mommy, a pucka-shell necklace. But it’s not easy when there are only mussels on the beach. When suddenly, Turbulent finds a gorgeous shell, he puts it against his ear to listen to the sea when surprise! The shell tickles him, it’s a hermit crab which fascinate Poet and Girl. They imagine themselves living great adventures in the deep sea with their new friend. But during their game, the Triplets didn’t realize the tide had risen. They are stuck on their rock, how will they escape?

programme.title: The Fox-Badger Family
programme.desc: It’s Mother’s Day when all the mothers get together to talk about their daily lives and the community. Meanwhile, the fathers and children prepare them a pleasant evening along with some surprises. Rosie has decided to mark the occasion with a lovely sculpture for her mother but things do not turn out quite as expected.

programme.title: Caillou’s New Adventures
programme.desc: Caillou builds a fort in the garden with Daddy, and they camp out overnight, but its spookier than Caillou expected.

programme.title: Caillou’s New Adventures
programme.desc: Caillou watches a ninja tv show and wants to learn Karate and learns to admit when he needs help in the class.

programme.title: Thomas and Friends
programme.desc: The excitement continues for Thomas And his friends in Series 19. Thomas causes an accident by being silly, blaming an imaginary engine named Geoffrey, but then proves he is a good friend by helping Hiro. Elsewhere, Diesel is visited by some ghostly Christmas engines, Percy struggles to keep track of his woolly cargo and the engines work as a team to rescue a stranded whale.

programme.title: Chuggington
programme.desc: It’s the trainees’ day off -­‐ and Koko and Brewster want to do things they never normally do. Wilson is in charge and he’s organised lots of activities for them – feeding the monkeys at the Safari Park and pretending to be Action Chugger on a flight simulator. But when the fun ends sooner than Wilson had planned, he must think of something fast so that he doesn’t disappoint his friends. Just as Wilson runs out of ideas, they come across Chatsworth.

programme.title: Chuggington
programme.desc: It’s a cold day, and Chug Patrol need more salt from the mines to keep Chuggington tracks safe in the icy weather. They escort the chuggineers up the mountain to the quarry, where the salt is mined. When they get there, Speedy is loading bags of salt onto a wagon using a pulley system. Jackman leaves Wilson in charge of things while he escorts Brewster back with the first load of salt. But when Jackman is detained by an accident, Wilson is the only Chug Patroller on the mountain -­‐ and when Fletch is trapped under a snowdrift, he has to think on his wheels.

programme.title: Charley Goes To School
programme.desc: Today is picture day and Charley has dressed up and made himself all handsome for the class photo. But an unfortunate mishap leads to his overalls getting a big stain! How can he get rid of it before the photographer arrives? Charley’s friends do have a few suggestions but nothing really seems to work…

programme.title: Ruff Ruff, Tweet And Dave
programme.desc: Ruff-Ruff, Tweet and Dave’s kites won’t work. Hatty takes them to land filled with windy windmills to help make their kites fly high.

programme.title: Charley Loves Nature
programme.desc: T’choupi and Nina are planning to go on a picnic with Nina’s donkey Coquelicot but the animal is stubbornly refusing to leave its enclosure! So the two friends decide to pamper it to get it to loosen up, hoping it will then be more inclined to move! But it’s no good: the nervous donkey simply refuses to budge an inch!

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: In a bamboo forest, Kai is controlling his drone, Kaimera1000, to test the drones moves but gets startled when he sees a beetle on the hologram screen. Kai drops the drone, and they discover a giant panda paw print next to it. Felt curious, he plans to call the Junior Rangers. Back in the garden, Leo is relaxing while Katie draws. He asks Katie to pass him an apple but Katie ignores him and tell him to do it himself. Kai then contacts Leo through his wrist gadget, showing him the giant paw print he found. Leo and Katie go to the treehouse and use the computer to confirm that the paw print belongs to a giant panda. They learn about giant pandas characteristics, such as their black and white fur and their status as a national treasure in China. They discover that giant pandas used to be critically endangered but are now less threatened due to conservation efforts. Leo contacts Kai again, and they decide to find and study the giant panda. Leo, Katie, and Hero, their dog, get ready and embark on their mission and meet at Kais location. The Junior Rangers meet up with Kai and they try to find the panda, thanks to Kais drone. They then meet up a Giant Panda who is eating some bamboos. Kai try to capture pictures but then Hero suddenly barks at it. The children then see a Panda cub starts following Hero. It tries to playfully wrestle with Hero. Hero isnt amused as the panda cub keeps bothering him. Hero then gets annoyed and runs away, causing the panda cub to choose over Hero then its mother. The mother panda realizes its cub is missing and starts bleating a sound.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: There will be a puppet show in the middle of the forest. Berry, Dolly, Balthazar and Eddy also get going to watch the show. Eddy and Balthazar had a fight over a pebble when Eddy, the potato beetle, felt down. Oh my!

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: One day, Egon happily played with his new black scooter. The others also wants to try it but Egon not in the mood for sharing at all!

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: Berry the snailboy and Dolly the ladybird are the best friends ever. They’re having many pretty adventures in 3X13 short tales, while they make new friends and get knowledges about the world around them.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: Berry, Dolly, Stanley, Balthazar, Flutter and Bubble are hiking in the forest on a beautiful autumn day. Suddenly they recognized that someone is crying in the bush. They found a mushroom without his hat. The friends immediately start to help him.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: One spring day, Frank longhorn beetle visits his friend, Stanley. Frank suggests to organize a football match. Everyone wants to play football, the two teams get together quickly. The girls cheer on the sidelines. The game is about to start.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: It’s a hot day and Bing and Flop buy an ice lolly from Gilly the ice cream lady. Before they can eat them a frog hops into Bing’s paddling pool and they go to the rescue. By the time they return to the ice lollies all that’s left are the sticks and a plate of lolly goo.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing gets very enthusiastic when he and Sula paint a mural and his painting starts to drop all over Sulas. Sula is upset until she realises that the painting isnt spoiled, its just different.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing gets stuck when he takes a game of hide-and-seek too far.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing and Flop are building a sandcastle when Pando joins them in the sandpit with his wind-up digger toy to help. Bing finds a lovely ‘poiky thing’ in the sand and thinks it will make the perfect decoration for the top of his castle not realizing it belongs to Pando’s digger.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing and Sula collect acorns in the park with Flop, but Bings pile keeps shrinking.

programme.title: Bing Bunny - Shorts and characters
programme.desc: Get to know our little pets better through charming stories featuring the characters from the popular Bing series.

programme.title: Simon
programme.desc: Today it’s super windy. In the yard, Simon and his friend Ferdinand are trying to get their kite flying. It works when it’s Ferdinand who is holding the kite but not when it’s Simon. And even worse, when it’s Simon’s little brother Gaspard holding on to the kite, it flies super duper high! Simon is bummed. He turns around and heads back home. But he quickly changes his mind when he sees that his brother is being carried away by the kite! Super Simon to the rescue!

programme.desc: As Woodsy is going to sleep over at Loudo’s, there is a spare place in the burrow. Rosie wants to invite Biva but Scoutbadger wants to invite Martis. Edmund, who does not like it when things get too boisterous, says only one friend can come. Scoutbadger and Rosie quarrel over which one can invite their best friend…

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Little Nutbrown Hare finds a very special feather with bright colours, spots and soft tickly bits. Just as he shows off to his friends how it can fly and float, a cheeky bird flies away with it. Little Grey Squirrel climbs her tree and discovers the bird using it to feather her nest. Will Little Nutbrown Hare find a way to get his feather back, or will he decide that the bird needs it more than he does?

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: One Spring morning a cute spotty ladybird lands on Little Nutbrown Hare and seems to want to stay with him. All his friends admire the interesting little creature and he feels very special indeed. When she eventually flies away Little Nutbrown Hare follows her, wanting her back. But he understands why she left when he discovers she has lots of tiny spotty babies.

programme.title: Boribon
programme.desc: Racing is exciting, but not for everyone. When Boribon feels sad because he hasnt won first place, Annalee cleverly finds a way to cheer the little bear up.

programme.title: Sam And Julia
programme.desc: Arriving from a faraway island, Julia the little mouse moves into a new home with her mother. There she meets Sam, another young mouse whos long lived with his parents and a whole gang of brothers and sisters. They quickly become inseparable and enjoy a host of fun adventures together.

programme.title: Sam And Julia
programme.desc: Sam and Julia find the boisterous Tonio frozen like a statue, in the yard, when he was supposed to bring them a snack! And he doesnt talk anymore, even though hes usually a real chatterbox...

programme.title: The Triplets
programme.desc: A dog? In the city? In an apartment? No way! answers Mom, and even Grandpa cannot be convinced. A dog is a lot of responsibilities. But the Kids keep on dreaming about a little dog: a Labrador? A German Shepard? A Yorkshire terrier? Once again the only answer they get is No! No! No!” However when Mom sees them writing a moving letter to Santa, she cannot resist nd says yes.

programme.title: The Triplets
programme.desc: The Triplets look back on the most beautiful day of their lives: the day they got Toto! When they had seen him at the pet shop they had immediately fallen in love with him but a customer was just about to buy the little dog. Toto, who had already grown fond of the Triplets, did everything he could to drive the customer away and it worked very well!

programme.title: Chuggington
programme.desc: The chuggers are making preparations for the Winter Parade through Chuggington. Special glowing coloured lights are fitted to the trains taking part in the magical procession. Disaster strikes when freezing fog traps Koko, who is collecting the Mayor. Wilson bravely goes out on a rescue mission and locates them, despite not being able to see them. He cleverly realises that to avoid the fog, they must go through the mountain - not down it.

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: Mandy and Sarah are making a film comparing what dogs and cats are good at, and the cats are clearly doing better than dogs, even at fetch! But soon a kitchen fire gives Nipper the dog a chance to save the day.

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: At a picnic on Annies farm, Peter comes up with a series of games that almost lead to disaster! Meanwhile, Lizzie and Jodie search for a rare seal.

programme.title: Kipper
programme.desc: Kipper thinks the Wonder Dog books are great and decides to be Kipper the Super Dog. His blanket becomes a cape and his bike a Super Bike. Now he needs someone to rescue. He makes Arnold’s kite fly when there’s no wind. But he becomes a real hero when he saves Jake’s kitten. Tiger wants to be a hero too. Pig asks him to rescue Arnold’s kite – it’s stuck in a tree – but Tiger’s not so sure when he sees how tall the tree is.

programme.title: Kipper
programme.desc: A magic carpet, complete with three wishes, turns up in Kipper’s house. He wishes himself and Hippo to the moon to meet the Bleepers. The carpet tips Hippo off when they reach the moon and the Bleepers find him and wonder what he is and how he got there. When Kipper turns up the Bleepers wonder how he got there. He tells them about the carpet but they laugh. He gives them a ride right round the moon and at last they believe him.

programme.title: Caillou (new 3D)
programme.desc: After Caillou blows up at Leo for falling behind in a relay race, Leo decides he no longer wants to play, so Caillou pretends to be an athlete who is criticized by his Coach (Leo) during a track and field meet. Realizing that his words were hurtful, Caillou cheers Leo on, making the race even more fun.

programme.title: Caillou (new 3D)
programme.desc: Caillou cant bear to dig up his beloved green bean plant in the school garden. He goes into a farming fantasy where an overly-fluffy sheep is reluctant to shave her wool. Caillou learns that while saying goodbye can be hard, it’s the only way to move forward.

programme.title: Thomas And Friends
programme.desc: Sonny is trying to prove himself to be a useful engine so that he can stay working on Sodor, but nobody seems to trust him... nobody apart from Diesel, that is! But can Diesel be trusted?

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: Zari was practicing her recording skill, imitating the bird sounds as she relaxing in the forest. Suddenly, she hears some whistles, squeals and clicks from a far. She investigates the sound through the bushes and come across a Mother Tapir and its baby. Zari never seen these anything like this before so she try approaching the animals. All of the sudden, a leopard appears and targets the mother Tapir. Zari wants to help so she blows her recorder to scare the animal off. Her plan works but it also causes the baby Tapir to run away on another direction than its mother. Zari felt worried for the baby Tapir and calls on the Junior Ranger. In the garden, Leo And Katie are deciding which 2 types of carpets to put in their treehouse. They were discussing on which carpet pattern is more good. They cant decide and let Hero to help them pick an answer. Suddenly, they get interrupt by Zari whos asking them to help with the poor lost baby Tapir. After learning the information from Zaris picture and learn its a Malayan Tapir, the Junior Rangers grab their backpack and head out to help Zari. The Junior Rangers rode PlatypusOne and arrive in the forest. There, they meet up with Zari and the mother Malayan Tapir. The mother Malayan Tapir was sad and begin to make whistling and clicking noise to reach to her baby. Zari told the Junior Rangers those were the sound that she heard earlier. Zari then spots a brown furry spotted animal from a far and tell them to see if its the baby Tapir theyre searching for. Eventually it is reveal to be a Malayan mouse deer.

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: Kyle was lounging on the beach, stargazing with his toy kangaroo Stella as he admiring the peaceful moment. Then he was interrupted by a fallen coconut. Startled by the sound, Kyle grab his flashlight to check out. Turns out a coconut has fallen and it nearby fallen besides him. Unknowing to him, a big coconut crab climbs down behind him. He turns around and was surprise. He then realize its a crab and gets fascinated by it. The crab then immediately goes down and eat the opened coconut. Kyle take the picture and send it to the Rangers. Back at the base, Katie is showing Leo of the new night vision feature she has on her tablet. Katie points her tablet elsewhere and they see 2 white dots running towards them from the garden forest, ultimately reveals it to be Hero. Leo pets Hero before receiving a call from Kyle. Kyle explain on the crab he discovers, currently towering over a coconut at the moment. Katie analyses the picture and learn its a Coconut Crab. After learning of the animal, Leo has a safety concern for the beach-goers and suggest they go there to put signs on the beach. The Ranger equip their gear and ride PlatypusOne to meet up with Kyle. At the beach, the Rangers sees Kyle observing the coconut crab. They have a discussion on how to making the wooden sign.

programme.title: Postman Pat Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Pat has to work out how to fix two malfunctioning robots that are causing havoc.

programme.title: Postman Pat Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Postman Pat makes a daring rescue attempt when PC Selby is carried away by balloons.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing and Sula help Amma to get lunch ready. Bing watches yummy peas and delicious carrots go into the pot, but when lunch is served theyre all mixed up together and Bing doesnt like it.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing falls in love with a lost dog he and Flop find in the park and decides he wants to keep her. When the owner turns up Bing is very upset when it comes to saying goodbye to his new friend.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: When the children make Eggy heads with eggs and cress seeds, Bing gets impatient and wants his cress to grow quicker so he decides to give Eggy lots of water with the garden hose.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: The bunny gets jealous when Sula gives Pando more attention on a playdate. He tries to gain some for himself and ends up being pushed, so Amma show them how to get rid of the anger

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing is playing the talking lettuce game on Flops phone when he drops the phone and accidentally breaks it

programme.title: Oswald
programme.desc: Henry is reluctant to go to the beach with Oswald and Daisy because he hates getting wet, but Oswald eventually manages to persuade him and they all head off. Once there, Daisy starts splashing around, inadvertently scaring Henry away from the water. She decides to go surfing so she’s out of Henry’s way while he settles down to read his newspaper on his special Penguin Patrol raft. Suddenly Daisy appears riding a huge wave and heading straight for the beach – and the unsuspecting Henry! Everyone ends up in the water. Just as well, since Daisy has got stranded on a sandbar and needs rescuing.

programme.title: Oswald
programme.desc: The Annual Big City Sand Sculpture Contest is taking place at the beach, and Oswald is judging the final entries. Each competitor has his or her own method of creating sand sculptures and there are some interesting results – Henry uses very exact methods while Daisy has a more unstructured approach. Oswald thinks that all of the sculptures are good in their own way and finds it very hard to decide who’s is the best. However, he ends up not having to choose when Pongo jumps into the sea making such a splash it causes all of the sculptures to merge into one beautiful and very unique giant sculpture – the clear winner!!

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob and the gang are building an Automatic Car Wash for Curtis’s Garage, but Roley is being as obsessive as ever, checking and re-checking that the newly laid tarmac is absolutely, completely flat. Just as Roley gives Bob the all clear to start building, Mayor Madison and Mr. Bentley arrive in Phillip expecting to use the car wash! Wendy explains they’ve been held up – but to come back later. Once the car wash is ready, Wendy explains how the control console works and does a ‘test run’. It works perfectly and at last Curtis can re-open his garage. Roley, however, is still not convinced the tarmac is flat. To re-assure him Bob tells Leo to do one more test run. As the run starts, Roley thinks he sees some un-flattened tarmac and rushes into the car wash to flatten it!

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: While working at Fixham Campsite, Dizzy wants to camp out with Leo and the Spring City Rockets till she’s put off by the creepy crawlies. She later regrets her decision and returns with Scoop and Muck but they are frightened by the spooky story Leo is telling and the Rockets think they are the creatures from his story. Everyone panics and the build is damaged as they flee. Dizzy gets her wheel stuck in a ditch and is left behind.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Its Little Field Mouses birthday and Little Nutbrown Hare wants to give her exactly the right gift. After a moment’s thought he realises he has no idea what to give her. Big Nutbrown Hare encourages his son to think about everything he knows about his friend. He remembers she likes to look nice on her birthday, so her makes her a lovely necklace and she is delighted!

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Little Nutbrown Hare keeps winning a game with Little Field Mouse, and enjoys it so much he doesnt realise she is frustrated with losing. Big Nutbrown Hare helps him realise that winning is less important than making sure everyone enjoys playing the game. So Little Nutbrown Hare invents a new game that Little Field Mouse and her twin siblings can enjoy playing too.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Days On a hot Summer’s day Big Nutbrown Hare wants the young ones to have some relaxing time by the river. Like most young kids they have trouble staying quiet and still. When they do finally manage some quiet time, they experience the variety of life that the river has to offer, including some rare birds and a family of terrapins.

programme.title: Learning Time With Timmy
programme.desc: Timmy and Otus are having fun building a den. Help them decorate it.

programme.title: Hurray for Huckle!
programme.desc: When a new nameplate is about to be placed on the statue of Admiral Hornblast, it suddenly disappears. Huckle, Sally and Lowly check out the photos and videos taken at the scene and ultimately determine that the statue slide over the plate when it was bumped by an out of control bulldozer./Pig Will and Pig Won’t are playing spies. However Pig Won’t suddenly finds himself out of the game when his Secret Spy Ring disappears!

programme.title: Messy Goes To Okido
programme.desc: In the real world, Messy is climbing a pile of mud in his garden and wonders what the words get up to under all that amazing mess! When Messy needs to know he goes to Okido! When he arrives, Felix and Zoe are off to dinner at Mayor Oki’s house with him and his mother. Mayor Oki is lamenting the size of his pumpkins when they get there and he hopes they can help him make the pumpkins big and ripe, as he has promised his mother her favourite meal – pumpkin soup.

programme.title: Messy Goes To Okido
programme.desc: In the real world Messy has just finished eating all the hiking-sock-flavoured jam, and he doesn’t know what to do with all the jars, so he goes to Okido to ask! When Messy lands, Felix and Zoe are playing some new instruments that they made them themselves! Suddenly, Zoe realises she has lost her communicator. Zoe thinks it must be in the Cloudship, so they hail the Okidoodle to take them there. Zam is putting out the rubbish when they arrive, and Zim has just finished cleaning the entire kitchen! Clearly it’s not where Zoe left it, so they check the bins in case it was thrown away by accident. But the rubbish has already been taken when they get there!

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcakes Berry Bitty Adventures
programme.desc: Blueberry invites Huck to return to Berry Bitty City to co-write a story with her to submit to an online mystery magazine. He is hopeful that if the story is accepted, he can raise funds for his new Huck’s Hotel for Homeless Pets. But as they write the story, Huck feels he isn’t contributing anything—Blueberry’s insistence on duplicating the style of Patti Persimmon dominates their story. Trouble ensues when Blueberry learns Huck is writing a song with Cherry. She thinks he has found a new writing partner he likes better than her.

programme.title: Harry And His Bucket Full Of Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Charlie is having a sleepover and has invited Harry, however, Charlies Mum says he is only allowed to bring one of the dinos with him.

programme.title: Harry And His Bucket Full Of Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Harry goes to Dino-World to learn how to make origami animals.

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: Join the Junior Rangers as they race across the tundra to reunite a lost reindeer calf with its herd. However, a river crossing might prove too tiring for the young reindeer.

programme.title: Thomas and Friends
programme.desc: When Philip shows off to James about how many trucks he can pull, James decides to prove that he is the stronger engine by pulling a very long train. Soon disaster strikes as James can’t control all of the trucks and comes off the rails breaking through the side of a stone bridge. Philip races to save James and the brave little engine slips under James to rescue his new friend from falling and props him up until help arrives.

programme.title: Thomas And Friends
programme.desc: Sidney is a very hard working diesel, but he’s also very forgetful. One day The Fat Controller gives him a very special job – Sidney needs to go to Brendam Docks to collect Percy’s new wheels. But when Sidney admits that he’s worried he might forget what he has to do, Thomas suggests making up a little song to help him remember. Sidney goes off happily singing a song about collecting a crate from Brendam docks, but when he stops to talk to Gordon he gets distracted, forgets what he’s supposed to be doing, and ends up at The Waste Dump looking for boilers then The Animal Park waiting for an elephant!

programme.title: Grisu
programme.desc: Grisu has a new mission: helping Toramento to change the lighthouse’s bulb. Soon he discovers that this is not the only problem with the lighthouse. The rotating lamp is also blocked by a seagulls nest. And the seagull doesnt allow anyone to approach its nest. Grisu, being attacked by the animal, spits a flame and burns the bulb. How to replace it? He must find a solution quickly before a boat runs aground on the reefs. Could Fume do the trick? Grisù asks his father for help. Thanks to Stella and Toramento, Fume will overcome his hate of water, thus being able to reach Grisu. Then, he will replace the light bulb by spitting out the biggest flame ever.

programme.title: Grisu
programme.desc: Natureza wants to study hawklings about to hatch on top of Mount Dragonberg and for that, she needs to set up a camera in their nest. Grisu accompanies her – as a fellow mountain climber. But hes not quite a seasoned one and has a few comic failures (fortunately he has a safety rope). As they are about to cross a wooden bridge, Fume – whos tagging along – accidently wakes up a grumpy bear. Surprised, Grisu breathes out a flame that burns the bridge, ruining the expedition. But a firefighter never gives up.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Little Field Mouse finds a sparkly rock and announces that it’s treasure. Little Nutbrown Hare wants a sparkly treasure too, so they set about finding him one that night, by the silvery light of the full moon. Together, they discover that treasure is found in the most unexpected places. When a very ordinary looking rock cracks open to reveal sparkly crystals inside, Little Nutbrown Hare realises that things are not always what they seem.

programme.title: Great Conductors: Pierre Boulez - Emotion and Analysis
programme.desc: The conductor Pierre Boulez described his relationship with Bela Bartok (1881-1945) as a "sympathy between musicians": both belong to the 20th centurys most influential artists. A key work of Bartok is the ‘Concerto for Orchestra’, which was premiered in Boston in 1944. The Film ‘Emotion and Analysis’ follows Pierre Boulez in his rehearsals of this composition with the Berlin Philharmonic in the spectacular setting of the monastery Mosteiro dos Jeronimos in Lisbon. Pierre Boulez explains in a series of interviews the historical origins of Bartoks late work, his own personal style of interpretation and his role as conductor as well as his love of composing.Subtitles available for this program with your remote control

programme.title: Dietrich Fischer-Dieskau : Dernières paroles
programme.desc: The great German baritone Dietrich Fischer-Dieskau was greatly admired for his interpretive insight, note-perfect control of the tonal qualities, and shadings of color in his voice, for exceptional rhythmic sense and impeccable diction. His reputation as a lieder singer is so high – he had a repertoire of more than 3.000 songs – that it is easy to forget his extensive list of operatic roles. In this conversation Fischer-Dieskau reveals for the last time on camera the secrets of his outstanding career. His ‘Last Words’ provide a deep insight into the extraordinary artistic life of one of the most famous and prolific lieder singers of our time. Dietrich Fischer-Dieskau died in May 2012 at the age of 86.Subtitles available for this program with your remote control

programme.title: Yehudi Menuhin, le violon du siècle
programme.desc: Lord Yehudi Menuhin, relaxing at his home in the Greek isles, tells the story of his wonderful career on the eve of his 80th birthday. A wealth of rare archival material illustrates this highly informative and entertaining profile of the worlds greatest violinist, providing insight into the life of the young San Franciscan wonderchild, his sudden rise to stardom which led to an outstanding international career, his encounters with the worlds greatest musicians and music traditions, and his involvement in world politics.Subtitles available for this program with your remote control

programme.title: Beskyddare av egyptens skatter
programme.desc: Arkeologer avslojar nya bevis om Egyptens storhetstid under Nya riket. Ett team undersoker varfor mumierna efter några av Egyptens mest beromda faraoner från denna guldålder hittades gomda i en enda, omarkt grav i en bortglomd dal. Genom att grava ut ooppnade kammare, leta efter begravda monument och skanna av klipporna med dronare forsoker experterna skapa en ny historia.

programme.title: Beskyddare av egyptens skatter
programme.desc: Arkeologer letar efter ledtrådar som kan forklara hur krigarfarao Ramses den store fick sin legendariska status. I skuggan av hans forsta gigantiska tempel graver de upp en begravd byggnad fylld med ben. Langre soderut, på jakt efter mumier, soker de igenom ett berg av doda for att ta reda på hur det gick for den store kungens arv nar Egyptens guldålder borjade falla sonder.

programme.title: To Catch A Smuggler
programme.desc: HSI genomfor en kontrollerad leverans av vapendelar i NYC. CBP stalls infor en radikal okning av metamfetamin som når Calexico, samt forhor en påstådd sexturist i Miami.

programme.title: To Catch A Smuggler
programme.desc: Inte ens under en pandemi tar smugglarna ledigt. Efter att ha justerat sin taktik under pandemins forsta tid for att mota det okande flodet av narkotika vid landets sodra grans riktar USA:s inrikesdepartement nu åter blickarna mot landets flygplatser, dar den internationella resebranschen åter fått luft under vingarna. Departementet anvander alla till buds stående medel for att fånga smugglarna.

programme.title: Dranerade varldshav
programme.desc: Nar Vesuvius fick sitt utbrott for 2 000 år sedan begravdes staderna Pompeji och Herculaneum. Idag avslojar nya fynd invånarnas sista dramatiska ogonblick instangda i utbrottets efterbord. Arkeologerna upptacker att många av dem som dog tillhorde en tidigare okand varld av forslavade folk, en bortglomd klass okanda manniskor som var vital for romarsamhallet.

programme.title: Car S.O.S
programme.desc: Tim och Fuzz tavlar mot klockan nar de i hemlighet fixar en agaren kara Jaguar. Forsummad i två decenier ar det en stor utmaning. Kan de fixa till den utan att agaren upptacker dem?

programme.title: Car S.O.S
programme.desc: Nar John fick en hjartattack blev det for jobbigt att restaurera sin Mercedes 230SL. Tim och Fuzz siktar på att få igång den gamla motorn.

programme.title: Andra varldskriget: Havets helvete
programme.desc: Nar de allierade borjar anvanda grupper av hangarfartyg for att rasera det japanska imperiets starka fasten raknade de inte med flygplanen och piloternas sårbarhet. Bara en typ av farkost kunde smyga in, ta sig till ytan och genomfora raddningsuppdrag i fiendevatten. Nar Submarine Lifeguard League mobiliserades tvingades amerikanska ubåtsbesattningar riskera allt for att radda nedskjutna piloter.

programme.title: Andra varldskriget: Havets helvete
programme.desc: Andra varldskriget: Havets helvete ar en episodserie om striden under vattenytan och om de storsta ubåtarnas patrulluppdrag under kriget.

programme.title: Mysterious Islands
programme.desc: Femtiotre manskliga kvarlevor med skottskador gravs upp på en obebodd o i Kroatien. Sex mystiska flygande foremål ses ovanfor Puget Sound. På Isle of Wight upptacker paleontologer de fossila kvarlevorna av en tidigare okand dinosaurieart. Markliga rituella artefakter upptacks i Sverige och visar på dess religiosa roll under medeltiden och antiken.

programme.title: Haverikommissionen
programme.desc: Bara Frank Geibs snabbtankthet raddade Northwest Airlines Flight 85 från en katastrof 2002. Vad var det som gick snett?

programme.title: Haverikommissionen
programme.desc: Utredarna hapnar nar ett koreanskt fraktplan stortar utanfor London. Var forste polisen på plats mer intresserad av att radda ansiktet an planet?

programme.title: Paradisoarna
programme.desc: Öarna mellan Asien och Australien ar varldens biologiskt rikaste. Men med tanke på hur många arter som kallar dessa paradisoar for sitt hem – har ryms aven ett stort antal vackra och bisarra. Från tradklattrande kangurur till grisar som boxas, flodar av eld och till och med fisk som undflyr vatten – se vad det ar som gor dessa uråldriga oar så vilda, vackra och underbara!

programme.title: Mysterious Islands
programme.desc: Femtiotre manskliga kvarlevor med skottskador gravs upp på en obebodd o i Kroatien. Sex mystiska flygande foremål ses ovanfor Puget Sound. På Isle of Wight upptacker paleontologer de fossila kvarlevorna av en tidigare okand dinosaurieart. Markliga rituella artefakter upptacks i Sverige och visar på dess religiosa roll under medeltiden och antiken.

programme.title: Haverikommissionen
programme.desc: Ett mindre passagerarplan narmar sig en avlagsen flygplats i Papua i Indonesien nar det mystiskt forsvinner. Rok från en narbelagen bergstopp for raddningsmanskapet till vraket. Och fastan tre olika team hade kunnat forhindra tragedin ar det nu upp till utredarna att ta reda på varfor inget av teamen gjorde just detta.

programme.title: Haverikommissionen
programme.desc: LAM Mozambique Airlines Flight 470 ar på vag till Angola nar det forsvinner från radarn. Skogvaktare i en nationalpark i Namibia hittar slutligen vraket, och utredare ansluter sig till ett lokalt team for sitt storsta arende någonsin. Vraket ger den forsta storre ledtråden, och efter att ha avfardar några mojliga orsaker ar det till slut en enda, hårresande slutsats som återstår for utredarna.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: For en isvagsbargare ar enda sattet att generera tid for familjeliv att gora arbetsytan till ett hem - en plats for såval familj som vanner.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: I nordligaste Norge kampar ett gang vagraddare varje dag med att hålla vagarna oppna och sakra. Skadekontroll ar en nyckelfaktor.

programme.title: Lost Ships of WW2
programme.desc: Det som hande ombord på USS Juneau skulle inspirera till filmen ”Radda menige Ryan”. Fem broder omkom, men alla dog inte nar fartyget sjonk. Minst en bror var bland de många man som strandade till havs under åtta fruktansvarda dagar.

programme.title: World War II: Secrets from Above
programme.desc: Augusti 1942: Medan Hitler riktar blickarna osterut utplånar vågor av tyska bombplan den sovjetiska staden Stalingrad. De utbranda fabriksskalen blir ett slagfalt med prickskyttar, eldkastare och narstrid. Utmattade trupper moter sedan brutaliteten i att kampa sig igenom den ryska vintern. Berattat ur ett unikt helikopterperspektiv ar detta historien om det blodigaste slaget under andra varldskriget.

programme.title: Top Guns: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Eleverna står infor sitt sista och mest avgorande prov – en ikonisk luftstrid man mot man mot sina instruktorer. For att klara provet måste de anvanda alla fardigheter de lart sig under den avancerade fasen av utbildningen. Med bara några dagar kvar till examen borjar eleverna oroa sig for om de kommer att accepteras till en av de mest eftertraktade platserna i den amerikanska militaren.

programme.title: Haverikommissionen
programme.desc: En helikopter chartrad av basketlegendaren Kobe Bryant kraschar i Los Angeles och dodar alla nio ombord. Och mitt i ett globalt utflode av sorg soker utredarna bland data och vrak efter ledtrådar for att forklara hur en expertpilot - som flyger ett toppmodernt flygplan med en stor kandis ombord - kunde krascha in i ett berg under en rutt han kande till val.

programme.title: Life Below Zero: Port Protection Alaska
programme.desc: Gary åker till Alaska och ombes ta med några ankor hem till samhallet. Timothy ger sig ut for att jaga bjornar på egen hand.

programme.title: Life Below Zero: Port Protection Alaska
programme.desc: Med vintern i antågande utnyttjar Port Protection-borna det som återstår av bra vader och dagsljus, for att fylla på frysarna och avsluta nodvandiga sysslor.

programme.title: Beskyddare av egyptens skatter
programme.desc: Arkeologer letar efter ledtrådar som kan forklara hur krigarfarao Ramses den store fick sin legendariska status. I skuggan av hans forsta gigantiska tempel graver de upp en begravd byggnad fylld med ben. Langre soderut, på jakt efter mumier, soker de igenom ett berg av doda for att ta reda på hur det gick for den store kungens arv nar Egyptens guldålder borjade falla sonder.

programme.title: Beskyddare av egyptens skatter
programme.desc: Arkeologer utforskar dolda gravar och forsvunna tempel for att undersoka hur Tutankhamun forandrade de gamla egyptiernas satt att dyrka sina gudar. Vid Dra Abu El-Naga leder upptackten av tre kistor till en enorm, begravd grav. Och i det sedan lange bortglomda templet Hermopolis Magna hittar teamet bevis for en forntida, forbjuden religion.

programme.title: To Catch A Smuggler
